sentence.Network_en: All species of the Magnoliaceae are protected by the Forestry Regulations ( Cap . 96 sub. leg. ).
sentence.Network_cn: 本种为木兰科植物,受《林务规例》 ( 香港法例第96章附例 ) 保护.

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To reconfirm the medicinal plants of Aristolochiaceae, Caryophyllaceae, Menispermaceae, Illiciaceae and Magnoliaceae found in Guizhou Province.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 通过修订,确认贵州马兜铃科 、 石竹科 、 防己科 、 八角科和木兰科药用植物的种类.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 木兰科(Magnoliaceae)主要特征 ①乔木或灌木,稀藤本,长绿或落叶。②单叶互生,全缘,稀浅裂或有齿;托叶有或无。③花两性或单性,单生或数夺成花序;萼片3,稀4.
the distribution of magnoliaceae and continental drift ., 木兰科植物分布与大陆漂移.
magnoliaceac 樟科, magnoliaceae 黄玉兰, magnoliaceae 樟科

list.abs: investigation on the magnoliaceae plant resources in east china ., 华东地区木兰科植物资源调查.
taxonomic revision of the magnoliaceae from jiangxi province ., 江西木兰科植物修订.
new species of magnoliaceae of yunnan ., 云南木兰科的新种.

means.word_mean: 1. subclass Magnoliidae: genera Liriodendron; Magnolia; Manglietia
